body: Pierre Lucena from the blog Acerto de Contas, pays  tribute [pt] to Chico Science, deceased 14  years ago. He was the founder of one of the  most influential musical movements in Brazil - Mangue Beat - a blended rock and punk style with traditional beats from the northeast.
original_body: Pierre Lucena from the blog Acerto de Contas, pays tribute [pt] to Chico Science, deceased 14 years ago. He was the founder of one of the most influential musical movements in Brazil - Mangue Beat - a blended rock and punk style with traditional beats from the northeast.
title: Brazil: Tribute to musician Chico Science
